title: Trying to Reconnect issue

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Since the latest patch, I've been having this issue randomly everytime i try and log into League.

It either comes up with the message in the SS, or it doesn't log me in at all and says there's a queue then stops logging me in and says there has been an issue.

I've made a ticket, they're currently trying to help me out but as of yet nothing has worked, i just want to know if anyone else has had this issue and has been able to fix it?

Thanks.

replies.body: ive had this issue for a few days now, i cant see my summoner icon selection or any missions either. no luck in trying to fix it :(
Exactly the same with me.. hopefully someone can give us some instructions soon!
HOPEFULLLY, riot can admit its their own problem. then we might get instructions.
I see the tech agent has been able to do some troubleshooting with you! He's going to be able to look through more of your logs and dig much deeper in your ticket, so you're in good hands there ^_^!
Any progress? I had log in yesterday at least 6 times before it would let me stay on. Bare in mind I had to wait 5-10 mins each time. and i still cant see masteries. why does this happen? :( T-T.
